name: wednesday infidelity part 2 gf mix
description:
she do be rappin against a mouse tho

[I'M NOT AFFILIATED WITH THE BOX FUNKIN' TEAM, PLEASE DON'T CONFUSE THIS AS OFFICIAL.]

Hey, have you ever played Wednesday's Infidelity and wished you could play as GF, with new vocals and all? Well, now, you can!

  • New intro text! See my humble opinions and the random stuff I could come up with!
  • New week art edited by yours truly! All of them tell different stories, think you can figure them out?
  • Stupid cutscenes recorded straight in OBS! Witness the humor that I don't have!
  • Covers with GF singing in them, with the notable exceptions of Last Day, Needle Mouse, Unknown Defeat and Leak Ma Balls.
  • A half-baked full-baked Too Slow cover! (Still was a last minute thing.)

Will you be able to sing 'til he's happy again, or will you suffer a fate worse than death? crdits to:Evelynie
